item.title: Commerce Bancshares 将以 5.85 亿美元收购佛罗里达州同业 FineMark
item.description: 美国地区性银行 Commerce Bancshares 和 FineMark Holdings 周一表示，两家公司已同意通过一项价值 5.85 亿美元的全股票交易收购竞争对手 FineMark Holdings。【原文：U.S. regional bank Commerce Bancshares has agreed to acquire rival FineMark Holdings in an all-stock deal valued at $585 million, the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: 首席执行官在行业间流动
item.description: 五位消息人士周一告诉路透社，古驰（Gucci）的所有者开云集团（Kering）将聘请雷诺汽车首席执行官卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）。以下是其他转换行业的首席执行官的例子，以及他们的故事：【原文：Gucci owner Kering is set to hire Renault Chief Executive Luca de Meo, five sources told Reuters on Monday, in a move that will see de Meo pivot from the automotive to the luxury sector. Below are examples of other CEOs who switched industries, along with the stories of how they fared:】

item.title: 加密集团 Tron 将通过与 SRM 反向合并在美国上市
item.description: 香港加密货币企业家孙正义（Justin Sun）的区块链集团Tron将与SRM Entertainment反向合并，在美国上市。【原文：Hong Kong-based crypto entrepreneur Justin Sun's blockchain group Tron will go public in the United States in a reverse merger with SRM Entertainment , the companies said on Monday.】

item.title: Truth Social 比特币和以太坊 ETF 向美国证券交易委员会申请在 NYSE Arca 上市
item.description: Truth Social 比特币和以太坊 ETF 周一向美国证券交易委员会提交了草案文件，申请在纽约证券交易所 Arca 挂牌上市。【原文：Truth Social Bitcoin & Ethereum ETF on Monday filed draft paperwork with the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission to list the fund on NYSE Arca.】

item.title: 特朗普组织推出自主品牌移动电话网络
item.description: 特朗普组织推出了一个名为 "特朗普移动"（Trump Mobile）的移动网络，这标志着该组织为吸引保守派消费者而做出的新努力，其无线服务定位为主要电信供应商的替代品。【原文：Trump Organization launched a mobile network dubbed Trump Mobile, signaling a new effort to court conservative consumers with a wireless service positioned as an alternative to major telecom providers.】

item.title: 华纳兄弟发现公司债券持有人批准公司分拆计划
item.description: 华纳兄弟发现公司债券持有人以压倒性多数通过了一项计划，即分拆公司并建立与该交易相关的新资本结构。【原文：Warner Bros Discovery bondholders overwhelmingly approved a plan to split the corporation and put in place a new capital structure related to the deal, the company said Monday.】

item.title: 报告发现，加纳因黄金走私和与阿联酋的联系损失 110 亿美元
item.description: 据非营利组织 Swissaid 的一份报告称，加纳蓬勃发展的手工采金业每年因走私损失数十亿美元的收入，其中大部分黄金流向阿拉伯联合酋长国。【原文：Ghana is losing billions of dollars in revenue annually to smuggling from its booming artisanal gold mining sector with much of the gold flowing to the United Arab Emirates, according to a report by nonprofit Swissaid.】

item.title: Reddit 推出人工智能驱动的广告工具，帮助品牌利用用户讨论
item.description: Reddit 周一推出了两项新的人工智能广告功能，旨在通过挖掘平台上的用户对话帮助品牌提高参与度。【原文：Reddit launched two new AI-powered advertising features on Monday aimed at helping brands drive greater engagement by tapping user conversations on the platform, the company said.】

item.title: 纽约证券交易所母公司洲际交易所将在纽约证券交易所德克萨斯分部双重上市
item.description: 纽约证券交易所的母公司洲际交易所周一表示，将从 6 月 17 日起在纽约证券交易所德克萨斯分部双重上市。【原文：New York Stock Exchange-parent Intercontinental Exchange said on Monday it would dual list on NYSE Texas, effective June 17.】

item.title: 早间新闻以伊战火纷飞，市场风平浪静
item.description: 当今美国和全球市场的重要事件【原文：What matters in U.S. and global markets today】

item.title: 西班牙电信公司领导层变动后重塑拉美战略
item.description: 西班牙电信巨头西班牙电信公司（Telefonica）在新任首席执行官马克-穆特拉（Marc Murtra）的领导下，加快了减少其在拉丁美洲西班牙语地区风险敞口的计划，转而专注于四个主要市场。【原文：Spanish telecom giant Telefonica has accelerated plans to reduce its exposure in Spanish-speaking Latin America, where profitability is lower than capital cost, to focus instead on four main markets under new CEO Marc Murtra.】

item.title: 英国监管机构对奥姆尼康与英特普林132.5亿美元的合并案展开调查
item.description: 英国竞争监督机构周一对广告巨头宏盟集团（Omnicom）和英特公共集团（Interpublic）价值 132.5 亿美元的合并案展开调查，以评估该交易是否会导致英国市场竞争减少。【原文：Britain's competition watchdog on Monday launched a probe into the $13.25 billion merger between advertising giants Omnicom and Interpublic, to assess whether the deal could lead to a reduction in competition in the UK market.】

item.title: 委内瑞拉即将失去最宝贵的海外资产 Citgo 吗？
item.description: 美国法院组织的委内瑞拉 Citgo 石油公司母公司股份拍卖已进入最后阶段，竞标者提交了对这家美国炼油商的更好报价，债权人则希望收回部分收益。【原文：A U.S. court-organized auction of shares in the parent company of Venezuela-owned Citgo Petroleum has entered its final stages, with bidders submitting improved offers for the U.S. refiner and creditors hoping to recover a portion of the proceeds.】

item.title: 中东冲突阴影笼罩马来西亚石油业盛会
item.description: 周一，全球能源高管齐聚马来西亚首都参加行业会议，关注以色列与伊朗之间冲突的急剧升级。【原文：Global energy executives gathered in the Malaysian capital on Monday for an industry conference with an eye on the dramatic escalation in the conflict between Israel and Iran, which has fuelled worries that it could widen and disrupt supply.】

item.title: 美股期货持稳，关注中东紧张局势和美联储会议
item.description: 美国股指期货周一走高，原因是尽管伊朗和以色列之间的袭击仍在继续，而且人们对即将召开的美联储会议的关注也在增加，但油价缓和有助于平息市场情绪。【原文：U.S. stock index futures edged higher on Monday as easing oil prices helped calm sentiment despite ongoing attacks between Iran and Israel and increased focus on the upcoming Federal Reserve meeting.】

item.title: 美联储积极降息的希望减弱，投资者回避长期美国债券
item.description: 债券投资者预计美联储本周将再次维持利率稳定，他们正在远离期限较长的国债，因为鉴于美国经济衰退的可能性较低，他们降低了对积极宽松政策的预期。【原文：Bond investors, anticipating the Federal Reserve will hold interest rates steady again this week, are moving away from longer-dated Treasuries as they temper expectations for an aggressive easing given the lower chance of a U.S. recession.】

item.title: 美国制药公司豪赌中国，抢购潜在的大片药物
item.description: 新数据显示，美国制药商正加快从中国获得潜在新药分子的许可，他们押注能将低至 8000 万美元的预付款转化为数十亿美元的治疗费用。【原文：U.S. drugmakers are licensing molecules from China for potential new medicines at an accelerating pace, according to new data, betting they can turn upfront payments of as little as $80 million into multibillion-dollar treatments.】

item.title: 关税 "叠加 "再次令美国进口商头疼
item.description: 约翰-哈默（John Hamer）是得克萨斯州巴黎罗杰斯-韦德制造公司（Rodgers Wade Manufacturing）的总裁，该公司为 Ross Dress for Less 和 Ulta Beauty 等大型零售商制造商店固定装置。【原文：John Hamer, president of Rodgers Wade Manufacturing in Paris, Texas, makes store fixtures for big retailers like Ross Dress for Less and Ulta Beauty.】

item.title: 公共市场的最新趋势--比特币财政策略是什么？
item.description: 某些上市公司，包括一家由唐纳德-特朗普总统创办的公司，一直在疯狂购买加密货币，利用代币价格上涨和监管环境趋于缓和的机会，大肆进行这种引人关注的投资。【原文：Certain public companies, including one founded by President Donald Trump, have been going on a cryptocurrency buying spree, capitalizing on higher token prices and a softening regulatory environment to load up on the attention-grabbing investment.】

item.title: 据《德国商报》报道，欧盟准备有条件地接受美国 10%的统一关税
item.description: 据《商报》（Handelsblatt）周一报道，布鲁塞尔谈判代表希望，如果美国对欧盟出口到美国的所有产品征收10%的关税，将避免对汽车、药品和电子产品征收更高的关税。【原文：Brussels negotiators hope that offering to accept U.S. tariffs of 10% across all of the European Union's exports into the United States will avert any higher duties on cars, drugs and electronics, newspaper Handelsblatt reported on Monday.】

item.title: 微软为欧洲云客户制定数据保护计划
item.description: 微软周一表示，其欧洲云客户存储的数据将留在欧洲，受欧洲法律管辖，由当地人员控制运营，并完全受客户控制。【原文：Microsoft on Monday said data stored by its European cloud customers would stay in Europe, under European Law, with operations controlled by its local personnel, and under full control of customers.】

item.title: 消息人士称，Triton 和 Carlyle 正在权衡对德国 REMA Tip Top 的投标
item.description: 三位知情人士透露，包括凯雷（Carlyle）和 Triton 在内的私募股权基金正在权衡对德国工业设备制造商 REMA Tip Top 的出价。【原文：Private equity funds, including Carlyle and Triton, are weighing bids for Germany-based industrial equipment maker REMA Tip Top, which is exploring a possible sale, three people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 雷诺老板德梅奥辞职，有报道称他将转投 Gucci 的所有者 Kering
item.description: 雷诺首席执行官卢卡-德梅奥决定离开这家法国汽车制造商的消息，以及随后有关他将入主奢侈品集团开云集团（Kering）的报道，在各自行业引起了轩然大波。【原文：News of Renault Chief Executive Luca de Meo's decision to leave the French carmaker and subsequent reports of him being lined up to take charge at luxury goods group Kering has created a stir across their respective sectors.】

item.title: 法国时尚集团 Kering 历史上的重大事件
item.description: 据报道，古驰的所有者开云集团（Kering）即将任命雷诺的前老板卢卡-德-梅奥（Luca de Meo）为新任首席执行官。【原文：Gucci owner Kering is reported to be close to appointing Renault's ex-boss Luca de Meo as its new CEO.】

item.title: 谁是 Kering 新任首席执行官 Luca de Meo？
item.description: Gucci 的所有者 Kering 周一表示，已任命现任法国汽车制造商雷诺首席执行官 Luca de Meo 为新任首席执行官。【原文：Gucci-owner Kering has appointed Luca de Meo, currently CEO of French carmaker Renault , as its new chief executive, it said on Monday.】

item.title: 汽车制造商首席执行官德梅奥辞职，开云集团股价上涨，雷诺下跌
item.description: 周一早盘，开云集团（Kering）股价上涨，而雷诺（Renault）股价下跌，此前有报道称法国汽车制造商首席执行官卢卡-德梅奥（Luca de Meo）准备成为这家奢侈品制造商的新任首席执行官。【原文：Shares in Kering rose in early trading on Monday while stocks in Renault fell after reports the French carmaker's CEO Luca de Meo was poised to become the new chief executive of the luxury goods maker.】

item.title: 韩国成立美国贸易谈判工作组
item.description: 韩国工业部在一份声明中说，韩国于周一成立了一个特别工作组，负责与美国就工业和能源领域的关税和非关税事宜进行谈判，该工作组还将与私营部门进行协调。【原文：South Korea launched on Monday a task force on negotiations with the United States on tariff and non-tariff matters across industry and the energy sector that will also coordinate with the private sector, the Industry Ministry said in a statement.】

item.title: 以 ADNOC 为首的财团瞄准澳大利亚桑托斯公司
item.description: 阿布扎比国家石油公司（ADNOC）希望发展全球天然气业务，正牵头提议以 187 亿美元的价格收购澳大利亚第二大独立天然气生产商桑托斯公司（Santos），桑托斯公司已支持这一收购计划。【原文：Abu Dhabi's National Oil Company (ADNOC), looking to grow a global gas business, is leading a proposed $18.7 billion takeover of Australia's second-largest independent gas producer, Santos , which has backed the planned bid.】

item.title: BetMGM 提高了对 iGaming 和在线增长的年度预测
item.description: Ladbrokes 的所有者 Entain 周一表示，受 iGaming 和在线体育部门强劲增长的推动，其与米高梅度假村（MGM Resorts）的美国体育博彩合资企业 BetMGM 上调了年度收入和核心盈利预期。【原文：Ladbrokes owner Entain said on Monday BetMGM, its U.S. sports-betting joint venture with MGM Resorts , raised its annual revenue and core earnings forecast, driven by strong growth in its iGaming and online sports divisions.】

item.title: 雷诺的德梅奥将成为开云集团新老板的报道发布后，开云集团股价上涨
item.description: 在《费加罗报》报道卢卡-德梅奥将成为这家奢侈品制造商的新任首席执行官之后，开云集团的股价在周一早盘上涨。【原文：Shares in Kering rose in early trading on Monday after Le Figaro reported that Luca de Meo would become the new CEO of the luxury goods maker, after he turned around troubled automaker Renault in his five years at the helm.】
